channel.title: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
channel.description:
Hello,
I have got a problem with my vesta spear idk if it is the rong model but can somewane help cause maybe it is something ells cause i think i took good 1 it
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/X1RusherX1/VestaSpear.png[/img]
That shows what the problem is!
Thanks :D

item.title: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

L…
An client always work you say??
that is why when i login i just dc and everything is nulled
sorry but i think they call that not working -,-

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!

item.title: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

how can a client…not…work? I mean, this is Private servers here. We arent talking about trying to use a C++ program to play a java server. Any client should work for any server as long as its the right version. 317 377 508 etc. Though honestly i dont think it even needs the right version. As crossovers are possible. It all comes down to how hard you want to try to make it work.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!

why wud you use demise pking v5 for it :s get the allstar client

And allstar client wont work :S
Can anyone help?? ;D

item.title: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

[quote=“jakanddax222, post:4, topic:372514”]Is your client downloaded client, pre-made web-client, or a client that you made into a web-client yourself? If it’s a downloaded client or client you made into a web-client, look inside the folder you should find a file called ( Oh before I go on, I use a delta v16 client base, whats yours? You may have a different one that has different file names ) class8 or itemdef ( not really sure if that’s the name for re-named but its as close as I can think of ) Hopefully it’s class8 ( because if it is I can help you more ) when you go inside do ctrl+F and search “Vesta” when you find your spear you will also find a lot of code like:

if(i == 8063){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 15117; class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 15118; class8.anInt200 = 15118; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Vesta Spear"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A spear.".getBytes(); }
These are called you model INT’s and each model has them, each class8.anInt200 = 15118; stands for something, this one stands for the male wield model I think, Any way a few of these lines are the rotations and zooms, you use these to rotate and zoom in and out of the model, while it is in your Inventory. I don’t have the right INT’s but if I ever get them I’ll post them up, but try looking around, some people take a lot of time to get the zooms and rotations correct, copy then down and add them but show some gratitude, like saying thanks or rep++ don’t just leach.[/quote]

Im Using Demise Pking V5 Client
but i coded some things myself what your saying i already did all of that
only i added a model for in bag and dropping rong i think but aint so sure

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!

item.title: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
item.dc:creator: @jakanddax222 jakanddax222
item.description:
@jakanddax222 wrote:

Is your client downloaded client, pre-made web-client, or a client that you made into a web-client yourself? If it’s a downloaded client or client you made into a web-client, look inside the folder you should find a file called ( Oh before I go on, I use a delta v16 client base, whats yours? You may have a different one that has different file names ) class8 or itemdef ( not really sure if that’s the name for re-named but its as close as I can think of ) Hopefully it’s class8 ( because if it is I can help you more ) when you go inside do ctrl+F and search “Vesta” when you find your spear you will also find a lot of code like:

if(i == 8063){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 15117; class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 15118; class8.anInt200 = 15118; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Vesta Spear"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A spear.".getBytes(); }
These are called you model INT’s and each model has them, each class8.anInt200 = 15118; stands for something, this one stands for the male wield model I think, Any way a few of these lines are the rotations and zooms, you use these to rotate and zoom in and out of the model, while it is in your Inventory. I don’t have the right INT’s but if I ever get them I’ll post them up, but try looking around, some people take a lot of time to get the zooms and rotations correct, copy then down and add them but show some gratitude, like saying thanks or rep++ don’t just leach.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Vesta Spear!
